text:
#ThrowbackThursday 

#Canada trialed #Chloroquine for #covid19Canada last year.

Yup-despite expert cautions.

Trump pushed #hydroxycholoroquine & @MPMarilynGladu
parroted his disingenuous messaging of #Quinoline efficacy for #COVID19 Tx

This cost lives:
